title: Communication Email Unsubscribed
description: Fires when a recipient unsubscribes from an email list or campaign.

emailId.description: Unique identifier for the email that triggered the unsubscribe.

listId.description: Identifier of the mailing list unsubscribed from.

listName.description: Name of the mailing list unsubscribed from.

reason.description: Reason provided by the user for unsubscribing.

campaignId.description: Identifier of the associated email campaign.
